events.name: Fireside Chat with Mashable: The Next Generation Content Creation Process
events.description:
RSVP for free here: http://peatix.com/event/167339

Speaker: Mike Kriak, COO and CFO of Mashable

Join Mashable's Chief Operating Officer and Chief Financial Officer, Mike Kriak, as he discusses how one of the world's leading digital publishers is able to effectively create premium content for the digital generation across all platforms through the combination of art and science.

Mike will discuss how Mashable uses proprietary technology with both its brand partners and its own editorial staff to help inform its creativity process, which generates some of the most shared content across platforms - from Snapchat and Facebook to YouTube and Instagram to the Mashable site.
events.location: The Working Capitol, 1 Keong Saik Rd, Singapore 089109

events.name: Singapore PHP User Group Meetup - May 2016
events.description: Venue: Microsoft Singapore1, Marina Boulevard, NTUC Centre, Room 22CF-15 (22nd floor)Date: Monday, 16 may 2016Time: 7pm-9:30pm Speakers:=================== 1) Intro to Microsoft Developer DayPresenter: Koh Ming Hao 2) Making PHP's mail() asynchronousPresenter: Kai Hendry 3) Painless Freelancing with MomoCentral.. and the MokoM InterpreterPresenter: Jason Lim Yuen Hoe We'll talk about some of the tragically common pain points of being a freelance or agency-based web developer, what we've learned from it, and how we're creating a better freelancing experience at MomoCentral. In the spirit of the event we'll also end with a brief show-and-tell of a toy programming language interpreter we built in PHP that today sits as part of our core infra at MomoCentral. 4) Show and Tell: NextChapter.com.hk  Presenter: April Kwong A female crowdfunding website developed using Laravel. 5) PHP Tips: Migrating to PHP 7Presenter: Huiren Woo ================================= Venue and Food Sponsor: Microsoft Singapore
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, 22nd Floor, One Marina Boulevard, NTUC Centre, Singapore
events.group_name: The Singapore PHP User Group Meetup

events.name: Front End TL;DR May 16 2016
events.description:
Address: Carousell HQ, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #05-14. Singapore 139951

Have you ever come across something new in front end, had the browser tab open for weeks, but never found time to research it? Use this event as an excuse to dig a little deeper.

Front End TL;DR is a learning event where everyone participates. Helps to bring a laptop.

Join to level-up your front-end knowledge, meet other front-end developers, or learn how the engineers at the venue host ship code.

7:00pm — Arrival, seating, food & drinks 
7:15pm — Intro talk by the host 
7:30pm — R&D: random team assignment, choose a topic, learn something new 
9:00pm — Q&A: share what your team learned 
9:30–10:00pm — Mingle around if you wish.

Every third Monday of the month. Different venue each time.
events.location: Carousell HQ, Blk 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent #03-14, Singapore 139951
